set1.name: Sword of the Divine
set1.desc: Each second, the wearer has a 7% chance to gain 100% Critical Strike

set1.name: Neeko's Help
set1.desc: Place on a champion to create a 1-star copy of that champion and add it to your bench. Doing so consumes Neeko's Help.

set1.name: Runaan's Hurricane
set1.desc: Summon a spirit who mirrors your attacks, dealing 75% Damage

set2.name: Phantom Dancer
set2.desc: Wearer dodges the bonus damage from critical strikes

set2.name: Thornmail
set2.desc: Reflect 100% of damage mitigated from attacks

set2.name: Repeating Crossbow
set2.desc: On death, Repeating Crossbow bounces to a new unit and grants an extra +30% Attack Speed and +30% Crit chance

trait_items.name: Draven's Axe
trait_items.desc:
Gain 1 Attack Damage per gold in your bank (up to 80).

Attack grant 1 stack, up to 100 times, At full stacks, grant 7 gold and 1 item component(s).

trait_items.name: Goldmancer's Staff
trait_items.desc: Gain 1 Ability Power per gold in your bank (up to 80) and a 50% chance to drop 2 gold on enemy kill.

trait_items.name: Gambler's Blade
trait_items.desc: Gain 1% bonus Attack Speed per gold in your bank (up to 80). Each attack has a 6% chance to drop 1 gold.

trait_items.name: Mogul's Mail
trait_items.desc:
Grant 1 Armor, 1 Magic Resist, and 8 Health when taking damage, stacking up to 40 times.

At full stacks, grant 2 gold.

trait_items.name: Determined Investor
trait_items.desc: After dying during combat 8 times, this item is destroyed. Upon destruction, grant the item Diamond Hands, 1 Champion Duplicator and 15 gold.

trait_items.name: Diamond Hands
trait_items.desc: Once per combat at 66% and 33% Health, gain 1 gold and immunity for 1 seconds.

trait_items.name: Needlessly Big Gem
trait_items.desc: If the holder is alive after 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 1% more damage per gold you have. For every 2 units alive when this happens, gain 1 gold.

trait_items.name: Crown of Champions
trait_items.desc: Every 5 seconds, the next attack deals 9001x the amount of gold in your bank in true damage.

set7.name: Dragon Blessing
set7.desc:
Use on a Dragonmancer to make them your Dragonmancer Hero.

[Cannot be used in combat.]

set7.name: DarkflightEssence
set7.desc:
Health +130, Attack +13, Ability Power +13, Defense +13, Magic Resistance +13

[Acquired by copying items that cannot be crafted with the Descent of Darkness attribute]

trait_items.desc: Every 5 seconds, the next attack deals 9001x the amount of gold in your bank in true damage.

trait_items.name: Determined Investor

trait_items.name: Chainsword Bloodthirster
trait_items.desc:
Grant 20% Omnivamp.

Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 30% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 8 seconds. While the shield is acctive, the holder gains 50% Attack Damage.

Self-destructs after 1 round of player combat.

Omnivamp: heal for a percentage of damage dealt

trait_items.name: OVERFLOW_ERROR // Giant Slayer
trait_items.desc:
Grant 20% bonus Attack Damage and 20 bonus Ability Power. Abilities and attacks deal 30% more damage to enemies with more than 1 maximum Health.

Self-destructs after 1 round of player combat.

trait_items.name: Hand of Nondeterministic Justice
trait_items.desc:
Grant 2 effects:
- +25 Attack Damage and +25 Ability Power.
- 20% Omnivamp.

Self-destructs after 1 round of player combat.
Omnivamp: heal for a percentage of damage dealt

trait_items.name: Magnetized lonic Spark
trait_items.desc:
Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped for magic damage equal to 250% of their maximum Mana. The holder Taunts every 4 seconds.

Self-destructs after 1 round of player combat.
[Direct damage item]

trait_items.name: Shroud of Even Still-erness
trait_items.desc:
Grant 250 bouns Health.

Combat start: Shoot a beam that 35% Mana Reaves, 20% Chills, and reduces the movement speed of enemies by 20% for 3 seconds.

Self-destructs after 1 round of player combat.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

trait_items.name: Jump-Started Spear of Shojin
trait_items.desc:
Grant 30 bouns starting Mana and 20 bonus Ability Power. Every 3rd attacks restores 20 additional Mana.

Self-destructs after 1 round of player combat.

trait_items.name: Overlocked Sunfire Cape
trait_items.desc:
Grant 150 bouns Health. Every 1 second, 10% Burn and 33% Wound an enemy within 3 hexes for 10 seconds.

Self-destructs after 1 round of player combat.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

trait_items.name: Induction-Powered Warmog's Armor
trait_items.desc:
Grant 600 bonus Health and regenerate 0.5% maximum Health per second.

Self-destructs after 1 round of player combat.

trait_items.name: Gadgeteens Titan’s Resolve
trait_items.desc:
Grants 2% Attack Damage, 2% Ability Power, and 2% Attack Speed when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 30 times.

At full stacks, grant 30 Armor and 30 Magic Resist.

trait_items.name: Chainsword Bloodthirster
trait_items.desc:
Grant 20% Omnivamp.

Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 8 seconds. While the shield is acctive, the holder gains 50% Attack Damage.

Self-destructs after 1 round of player combat.

Omnivamp: heal for a percentage of damage dealt

trait_items.name: OVERFLOW_ERROR // Giant Slayer
trait_items.desc:
If the target has more than 1 maximum Health, deal 30% more damage with Abilities and attacks.

Self-destructs after 1 round of player combat.

+30% Attack Damage
+20 Ability Power
+10% Attack Speed

trait_items.desc:
Every 1 second, 10% Burn and 33% Wound an enemy within 3 hexes for 10 seconds.

Self-destructs after 1 round of player combat.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

trait_items.name: Gadgeteens Titan’s Resolve
trait_items.desc:
Grants 2% Attack Damage, 2% Ability Power, and 2% Attack Speed when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 30 times.

At full stacks, grant 30 Armor and 30 Magic Resist.

trait_items.name: Induction-Powered Warmog's Armor
trait_items.desc:
Regenerate 0.5% maximum Health per second.

Self-destructs after 1 round of player combat.

trait_items.name: Adaptive Implant
trait_items.desc:
Mod: While above 50% health, gain 30% attack damage and 30 ability power. While below, gain 30% omnivamp.

Overcharge: Always gain both effects, and their power is increased by 60%

trait_items.name: Virulent Bioware
trait_items.desc:
Mod: Release a virulent plague whenever you deal Ability damage, causing enemies within 1 hex of the target to take 20% more damage for 4 seconds.

Overcharge: Plague duration is 10 seconds and plague deals 5% max health magic damage per second.

trait_items.name: Hextech Exoskeleton
trait_items.desc:
Mod: Gain 30 armor and magic resistance. Every 5 seconds, cleanse all negative effects and heal for 12% of your max health.

Overcharge: Each time the wearer heals, deal 150% of the heal amount as damage to all nearby enemies.

trait_items.name: Shimmer Injector
trait_items.desc:
Mod: Gain 25% attack speed. The first time you would be reduced to 1 heath, increase the attack speed by 100% and heal for 35% of your max health.

Overcharge: Instead increase the attack speed 400% and heal 100% of your max health.

trait_items.name: Robotic Arm
trait_items.desc:
Mod: Attacks have a 40% chance to trigger 1 additional attacks.

Overcharge: Attack deal 50% Attack Damage as bonus true damage.

trait_items.name: Unstable Chemtank
trait_items.desc:
Mod: Gain 33% bonus max health and explode on death, dealing 35% of your maximum health as magic damage to nearby enemies.

Overcharge: Explosion gets larger and damage increases to 45% of your maximum health.

trait_items.name: Needlessly Big Gem
trait_items.desc: Once per combat: If the holder is alive after 15 seconds of combat, grant 1 gold per 2 living allies, and each living ally deals 1% more damage per gold in your bank (up to 60 gold).

trait_items.name: Draven's Axe
trait_items.desc: Gain 1% Attack Damage per gold in your bank (up to 60 gold).Attacks grant 1 stack, up to 100 times. At full stacks, grant 9 gold.

trait_items.name: Gambler's Blade
trait_items.desc: Grant 1% bonus Attack Speed per gold in your bank (up to 60 gold).Each attack has a 6% chance to drop 1 gold.

trait_items.name: Diamond Hands
trait_items.desc: Once per combat: At 50% Health, become invulnerable for 1.5 seconds and grant 2 gold.

trait_items.name: Mogul's Mail
trait_items.desc: Grants 1 Armor, 1 Magic Resist, and 6 Health when taking damage, stacking up to 40 times. At full stacks, grant 2 gold.

trait_items.name: Goldmancer's Staff
trait_items.desc: Grant 1 Ability Power per gold in your bank (up to 60 gold) and a 40% chance to drop 2 gold on enemy kill.

trait_items.name: Determined Investor
trait_items.desc: After dying during combat 8 times, this item is destroyed. Upon destruction, grant the item Diamond Hands, 1 Champion Duplicator, and 5 gold.

set9.name: Crown of Demacia
set9.desc: If the wearer starts combat in the front 2 rows, regenerate 2-7% maximum Health per second (based on stage). If they start in the back 2 rows, gain 1-7% AD and AP every second instead. If the wearer of this item dies, you instantly lose the fight.You can remove this item by benching the wearer.

set9.name: TheDarkinBlade
set9.desc: If the holder of this item gets a takedown, they will be consumed and Aatrox will be reborn!

set9.name: Scroll of knowledge
set9.desc: Use on a unit to open a special armory that offers every available emblem that matches that unit's inherent traits.

set9.name: Master work upgrade
set9.desc: Use on a unit to open an armory containing Radiant versions of that unit's craftable completed items. Upgrade the item you choose to its Radiant equivalent, and unequip it.

trait_items.name: Adaptive Implant
trait_items.desc:
Mod: While above 50% Health, gain 40% Attack Damage and Ability Power. While below, gain 40% Omnivamp.

Overcharge: Always gain both effects, and their power is increased by 60%.

Omnivamp: Heal for percentage of damage dealt

trait_items.name: Hextech Exoskeleton
trait_items.desc:
Mod: Deal 12% more damage. Take 12% less damage. Every 5 seconds, heal for 20% maximum Health.

Overcharge: You are immune to crowd control, and the heal is increased to 30% maximum Health.

trait_items.name: Robotic Arm
trait_items.desc:
Mod: Attacks have a 40% chance to trigger 1 additional attack.

Overcharge: Attacks and abilities deal Attack Damage as bonus true damage.

trait_items.name: Shimmer Injector
trait_items.desc:
Mod: Gain 44% Attack Speed. The first time you would be reduced to 1 Health, increase the Attack Speed bonus by 100% and heal for 35% maximum Health.

Overcharge: Instead increase the Attack Speed bonus by 200% and heal for 100% maximum Health.

trait_items.name: Unstable Chemtank
trait_items.desc:
Mod: Gain 40% maximum Health and explode on death, dealing 25% of your maximum Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

Overcharge: Explosion radius is increased to 3 hexes.

trait_items.name: Virulent Bioware
trait_items.desc:
Mod: For 3 seconds after ability cast, dealing damage applies a plague causing the target and enemies within 1 hex to take 20% more damage for 5 seconds.

Overcharge: Plague duration increases to 10 seconds and plague deals 6% of the target's maximum Health per second as magic damage.

trait_items.name: Tattoo of Bombardment
trait_items.desc: Every third attack fires bolts at the two lowest percent health enemies which deal 60% Attack Damage as physical damage.

trait_items.name: Tattoo of Force
trait_items.desc: Whenever the holder acquires a new target they run quickly to and briefly stun them, dealing 250 magic damage, and double the stats from this item for 4 seconds.

trait_items.name: Tattoo of Fury
trait_items.desc: Deal 35% bonus damage to targets below half health. On takedown, gain 40% attack speed for 6 seconds.

trait_items.name: Tattoo of Protection
trait_items.desc: Gain a 40% max Health Shield after casting the first time each combat. When it breaks, grant 40% of this shield amount to the two nearest allies.

trait_items.name: Tattoo of Toxin
trait_items.desc:
Damage applies a toxin that deals an additional 33% of that damage over 3 seconds and 33% Wounds the target.

Wound: Reduces healing received

trait_items.name: Tattoo of Vitality
trait_items.desc: Attacks heal the holder for 3% of their max Health and deal the same amount as bonus magic damage.

trait_items.name: Scroll of Force
trait_items.desc: Kayle's ability hits a wider area

trait_items.name: Talisman of Aid
trait_items.desc: Kayle's damaging attacks and abilities 20% Shred and Sunder enemies hit for 3 seconds.

trait_items.name: Talisman of Speed
trait_items.desc: Grant Kayle and adjacent allies in the same row 12% Attack Speed at the start of combat.

trait_items.name: Scroll of Haste
trait_items.desc: Attack grant Kayle 6% stacking Attack Speed

trait_items.name: Tome of Swiftness
trait_items.desc: Kayle deals 20% more damage. Her attacks now hit in a 1-hex radius around the target

trait_items.name: Tome of Mending
trait_items.desc: Every 7 seconds, revive the strongest ally that hasn't been revived yet at 50% Health.

trait_items.name: Talisman of Might
trait_items.desc: Grant Kayle and adjacent allies in the same row 20 Ability Power at the start of combat.

trait_items.name: Tome of Power
trait_items.desc: Deal 15% more damage. When Kayle casts, she fires two waves.

trait_items.name: Faerie Queen's Crown
trait_items.desc:
After dealing damage 12 times, gain % Damage Amp for the rest of combat.

Only Faeries can hold this item.
Bench the champion to remove it.

trait_items.name: Eternal Monarch's Crown
trait_items.desc:
After dealing damage 12 times, gain % Damage Amp for the rest of combat.

After dealing damage 25 times, gain 20% maximum Health, 30% Omnivamp, and 50% damage amp.

Only Faeries can hold this item.
Bench the champion to remove it.
trait_items.fromDesc:
+30% Attack Damage
+30 Ability Power
+25% Attack Speed

trait_items.name: Queenguard's Armor
trait_items.desc:
Gain 20% increased healing and shielding. Heal for 5% of the Queen's damage dealt.

Only Faeries can hold this item.
Bench the champion to remove it.

trait_items.name: Armor of Eternal Flight
trait_items.desc:
Gain 50% increased healing and shielding. Heal for 20% of the Queen's damage dealt.

Only Faeries can hold this item.
Bench the champion to remove it.

trait_items.name: Corrupted Chassis
trait_items.desc:
All Shields are 15% more effective on the holder. Every 7 seconds, siphon 10% of the owner's max Health from the current target and convert it to a Shield for 5 seconds.

Recommended users: Mordekaiser, Jax, and Sejuani

trait_items.name: Holobow
trait_items.desc: Attacks that Critically Strike grant 2 bonus Mana. After casting an Ability, gain 40% Critical Strike Chance for 5 seconds.
trait_items.fromDesc:
+15 Mana
+30 Ability Power
+25% Attack Speed
+15% Attack Damage

trait_items.name: Repulsor Lantern
trait_items.desc:
Gain 5% health. Every 3 seconds, deal 6% of the holder's max health as magic damage to all enemies within 1-hex.

Recommended users: Jax, Mordekaiser, and Sejuani

trait_items.name: Pulse Stabilizer
trait_items.desc:
Execute enemies below 12% Health. Abilities can critically strike. If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

Recommended users: Jhin and Zeri

trait_items.name: Cybercoil
trait_items.desc:
Abilities and Attacks mark enemies for 8 seconds. Heal for 10% of damage dealt to marked enemies.

Recommended users: Sejuani, Jax, and Mordekaiser

trait_items.name: Flux Capacitor
trait_items.desc:
Attacks store charge. At 4 charges, the next attack consumes the charges to deal 8% of the target's max health as physical damage and reduces their Armor by 10.

Recommended users: Zeri and Naafiri

trait_items.name: Hyper Fangs
trait_items.desc:
When you damage an enemy, store 30% of your damage dealt to them. After 4 seconds, deal the stored damage to the target and the nearest enemy as physical damage.

Recommended users: Naafiri, Jhin, and Varus

trait_items.name: Pulse Silencer
trait_items.desc:
Execute enemies below 44% Health. Abilities can critically strike.Gain 44% Critical Strike Damage.

Recommended users: Jhin and Zeri

trait_items.name: Hijacked Cybercoil
trait_items.desc:
Abilities and Attacks mark enemies for 10 seconds. Heal for 75% of damage dealt to marked enemies.

Recommended users: Sejuani, Jax, and Mordekaiser

trait_items.name: Fully-Charged Flux Capacitor
trait_items.desc:
Every other attack is charged, dealing 20% of the target's max health as physical damage and reduces their Armor by 15.

Recommended users: Zeri and Naafiri

trait_items.name: Nullifier Lantern
trait_items.desc:
Gain 50% health. Every 1 seconds, deal 10% of the holder's max health as magic damage to all enemies within 1-hex.

Recommended users: Jax, Mordekaiser, and Sejuani

trait_items.name: Harmonized Chassis
trait_items.desc:
All Shields are 100% more effective on the holder.Every second, siphon 8% of the owner's max Health from the nearest 3 enemies and convert it to a Shield for 8 seconds.

Recommended users: Mordekaiser, Jax, and Sejuani

trait_items.name: Apex-Fangs
trait_items.desc:
When you damage an enemy, deal 100% of the damage to the nearest enemy as physical damage after a brief delay.

Recommended users: Naafiri, Jhin, and Varus

trait_items.name: Scoped Holobow
trait_items.desc:
Attacks that Critically Strike grant 10 bonus Mana. After casting an Ability, gain 100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.

Recommended users: Varus, Jhin, and Zeri
trait_items.fromDesc:
+40 Ability Power
+30 Mana
+20% Attack Speed
+15% Attack Damage

trait_items.name: Tornadoes
trait_items.desc: Every 6 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion spawns a whirl of Tornadoes, dealing magic damage.

trait_items.name: The Annihilator
trait_items.desc: At 6 seconds, The Annihilator deals percent max Health true damage once.

trait_items.name: Ani-Mines
trait_items.desc: Every 5 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion throws three Ani-Mines that explode, dealing physical damage in an area.

trait_items.name: Final City Transit
trait_items.desc: Every few seconds, Final City Transit summons trains that run through the battlefield, dealing devastating damage and carrying away low health enemies.

trait_items.name: Blade-o-rang
trait_items.desc: Every 4 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion throws a returning Blade-o-rang that deals physical damage, increased for the first target hit.

trait_items.name: Searing Shortbow
trait_items.desc: Every 5 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires Searing Shortbow, shooting an arrow that leaves an area that deals magic damage over time.

trait_items.name: Gatling Bunny-Guns
trait_items.desc: Every 5.5 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires Gatling Bunny-Guns in a long cone, dealing high physical damage.

trait_items.name: Guiding Hex
trait_items.desc: Every 4 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion casts Guiding Hex, dealing magic damage to 3 random nearby targets.

trait_items.name: Surprise Supply Drop
trait_items.desc: Every 8 seconds, Supply Drop calls in a support ship that drops powerful goodies onto the battlefield.

trait_items.name: UwU Blasters
trait_items.desc: Every 4 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion rapidfires UwU Blasters, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit.

trait_items.name: Vortex Glove
trait_items.desc: Every 5 seconds, a random Anima Squad champion fires piercing orbs from Vortex Glove, that deal magic damage, reduced for each enemy struck.

trait_items.name: Kingpin Hat #1
trait_items.desc: Promotes a Syndicate champion to Kingpin and upgrades their ability.

trait_items.name: Kingpin Hat #2
trait_items.desc: Promotes a Syndicate champion to Kingpin and upgrades their ability.

trait_items.name: Chrome
trait_items.desc: Chrome grants AP and Health.
